attributes.action: The Government should take immediate actions on the HK humanitarian crisis
attributes.additional_details:
The UK is the signatories of the Sino British Joint Declaration, so on it need to take actions to protect HK be quick. we looking for:
- Priority on Hong Kong crisis over Brexit
- Before the Hong Kong humanitarian crisis end, Any Brexit discussion and Act should pause 
- Includes the commonwealth members, the UK needs to take powerful and efficient protect all the nationals and citizen in HK
- base on point two, UK need to call EU to get the long extend until the HK crisis end
attributes.background: The Extradition Bill protest in Hong Kong has become a humanitarian crisis which civilians, including 3.4 million British nationals, EU and Commonwealth citizens, in Hong Kong are facing state terrorism, police brutality and organised persecutions supported by the Hong Kong and Chinese authorities.
